description: Automatically check in eligible accounts every day within a configurable time window.

settings.title: Auto Check-in
settings.enableDesc: Toggle the global auto check-in feature. When disabled, no check-in tasks will run.
settings.windowStartDesc: The earliest local time when the daily check-in can start.
settings.windowEndDesc: The latest local time when the daily check-in can start.
settings.viewExecutionDesc: View detailed results and logs for each automatic check-in run.

filters.searchPlaceholder: Search by account name or message...

empty.noHistoryDesc: Click "Run now" to execute automatic check-in for all eligible accounts
empty.noResultsDesc: Try adjusting your filters or search query

error.loadFailed: Failed to load auto check-in settings: {{error}}
error.invalidTimeWindow: Invalid time window. Start and end cannot be the same.

success.settingsSaved: Auto check-in settings have been saved.
